channel.title: [REQ]Forums Banner
channel.description:
i need a banner for my forums.
It needs to be the same sive as moparisthebest one because its going on an smf forums :D
The text on it must have Scape Server
The Colour must match the website colour (the same as these forums)
To see where the banner with go chcek the site in my signiture. (banner will be top left corner where Scape Server text is[br][size=1]Posted at: 05-12-2006, 10:50:32[/size][hr]come on i realy need one[br][size=1]Posted at: 05-12-2006, 13:55:35[/size][hr]i can give the unmentionable word as a reward

item.title: [REQ]Forums Banner
item.dc:creator: @dark_child dark_child
item.description:
@dark_child wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:4, topic:32544”]No, we want you to stop posting as if your still on Moparisthebest.org
when youre here, you need to learn a whole new system of manners
Don’t make a website for your server. its completely useless, you have a thread, and thats what it is for. leave it at that.
and dont think your all witty and whatnot becuase you said you will give unmentionables[/quote]lol that doesnt count for me cuz im on moparisthebest.com XD

Read full topic
